alert.note: Alert for Grand (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 26 at 4:57PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...River flooding caused by rain and snowmelt continues. * WHERE...A portion of north central Colorado, including the following county, Grand. * WHEN...Until 515 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 457 PM MDT, Previous rainfall along with snowmelt will continue to affect the Colorado River. This will cause minor flooding. - Colorado River is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Eastern Grand County
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
